KANKA.ErrorProvideAccessToken: You did not provide a valid Kanka access token or it has expired.
KANKA.ErrorInvalidAccessToken: The given Kanka access token is invalid.
KANKA.ErrorTokenExpired: Your Kanka access token is expired. Please provide a new one.
KANKA.WarningTokenExpiration: Your Kanka access token is going to expire withing the next week. Please provide a new one.
KANKA.SettingsToken.label: Kanka Personal Access Token
KANKA.SettingsToken.hint: You can retrieve an access token from https://kanka.io/en/settings/api
KANKA.SettingsCampaign.label: Campaign
KANKA.SettingsCampaign.hint: Select the campaign from which to import entries.
KANKA.SettingsCampaign.noToken: Please enter a valid access token
KANKA.Error.fetchError: There was an error fetching data from Kanka. Please check your settings and try again.
KANKA.SettingsImportLanguage.label: Import language
KANKA.SettingsImportLanguage.hint: This setting allows you to set the language which will be used for some metadata labels if it should be different from your default Foundry language. This only supports languages for which translations were provided.
KANKA.SettingsImportPrivateEntities.hint: Allow importing of entities that were marked as private.
KANKA.SettingsDisableExternalMentionLink: If this is checked all mention links to entries that were not synced to Foundry will be removed.
KANKA.SettingsEntityNotesVisibility.hint: Imports notes of all entities and marks them as secret if access is restricted.
KANKA.SettingsMetaDataBasicVisibility.hi: Which basic entity metadata (like type or age) should be imported.
KANKA.SettingsMetaDataAttributeVisibilit: Which attributes should be imported as metadata.
KANKA.SettingsMetaDataRelationVisibility: Which relations should be imported as metadata.
KANKA.SettingsMetaDataCharacterTraitVisi: Which character traits should be imported as metadata.
KANKA.SettingsMetaDataQuestReferenceVisi: Which referenced quest entities should be imported as metadata.
KANKA.SettingsImageInText.label: Include image in text
KANKA.SettingsImageInText.hint: Should the image be include next to the text in addition to the regular journal entry image?
KANKA.SettingsKeepTreeStructure.label: Create folder tree
KANKA.SettingsKeepTreeStructure.hint: Should Kankas tree structure be replicated via folders? The maximum depth is 3 folders.
KANKA.SettingsEntityTypeVisibility.hint: Should this type of entity be loaded? Reducing the types of entity also reduces the number of requests made to Kanka and thus improves the performance.
KANKA.BrowserNotificationSyncedFolder: Refreshed all Kanka entities of type {type}.
KANKA.BrowserNotificationLinkedFolder: Linked all Kanka entities of type {type}.
KANKA.MetaData.title: Title
KANKA.MetaData.author: Author
